argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = A /\ x = A ) -> ( x .ih x ) = ( A .ih A ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_anidms | |- ( x = A -> ( x .ih x ) = ( A .ih A ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( x = A -> ( sqrt ` ( x .ih x ) ) = ( sqrt ` ( A .ih A ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_dfhnorm2 | |- normh = ( x e. ~H |-> ( sqrt ` ( x .ih x ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( sqrt ` ( A .ih A ) ) e. _V |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( A e. ~H -> ( normh ` A ) = ( sqrt ` ( A .ih A ) ) ) |
